All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Accumulator
This class represents an accumulator component with a single register eax.
Machine
This interface defines the methods that a machine must implement.
Main
This class contains the main method and creates an instance of the SimpletronMachine class.
Memory
This class represents a memory component with a fixed size of 100 elements.
Operation
This class defines a set of constants representing operation codes for a machine.
SimpletronMachine
This class represents a simple machine that implements the Machine interface.
